A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot holes\, forced comedy\, and missed opportunities for great story telling brought this down immensely... The lack of subtle cohesion with the first film and so many lucky coincidences / lazy construction of plot devices became frustrating. With that said\, it did have it's moments.  My mouth was open for a few surprises and scenes that are quite the spectacle worth of a theater visit.  All in all\, they had major potential here\, but fell short.
